name: dougthehead
text: Stupid jerk fridge!

name: leon_sumbitches
text: sweet sweet child memories!

name: nathanielperson
text: I have to admit, I don't get what's going on with T�odor in panels 7-9.

name: psykeres
text: The bear is coming to the disconcerting realization that his hands are now coated in stale semen.

name: nathanielperson
text: A comment left by nathanielperson was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Interestingname, unquotable, atticusonline, apres)

name: spinynorman
text: got to wonder what that door smells like... I can guarantee you it ain't lilies and summer rain

name: scraggg
text: Depends on one's definition of the term "summer rain".

name: bixschmix
text: If your default definition of "summer rain" includes the smell of stale semen, tell me where you live so I can never visit.

name: scraggg
text: Pennsylvania, home to Three Mile Island and Philadelphia, both of which are notorious for their radioactive filth. Makes the summer rainstorms all kinds of crazy.

name: bixschmix
text: Ironically, I recently moved from Pittsburgh. So-- sad as it is-- I know *exactly* what you speak of.

name: scraggg
text: Everyone here seems to be proud of it, though. I just don't get it.

name: panopticism
text: chubbied for godspeed you! black emperor icon.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: doubly so.

name: tragicone
text: GY!BE sucks and I don't care what anyone has to say.

name: anzio
text: They do not suck. You are just not one who is partial to that which is post-metal.

name: pogo
text: "Radioactive filth" -- great name for a heavy metal band.

name: goatmasterflash
text: how terribly boomer of you to think so

name: belgand
text: I see it as more of a punk band name, but I wouldn't complain either way.

name: overmedicated
text: YOU SO OLD

name: greenkoolayd
text: i call it filth-adelphia.  i dont know if its because i know enough about it, in general, or because i live in central PA(pennsyltucky)...

name: bixschmix
text: There's Pittsburgh, there's Philly and then there's Alabama in the middle...

name: greenkoolayd
text: word.  a hole in the world, like a great black pit, etc...

name: sharktastic
text:
I live in Northeast PA, and I love Pennsylvania. It's great if you're into nature and wildlife. Not so great if you're into having a job, driving on smooth roads, or buying alcohol.
*fistbump to my fellow PA peeps*

name: greenkoolayd
text: i like the culture a city has to offer and i enjoy the positive aspects of small-town life(because i resemble a caucasian, there are positive aspects), such as abundant nature, friendly people, and lots of guns.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: I think it's more like a sudden realization that he is looking at trash porn instead of looking for the missing five-year-old.

name: dismas
text: That does not explain why he stares at his hands

name: money4something
text: He is smacking his open palm with his fist. DUH

name: nutmeg
text: he's realizing that he's losing focus. he came into this loathesome place with one single mission: FIND. PHILIPPE. FAST.

name: stuart
text: He's realizing Justin grew up to tear pages out of the sanctified Swedish Erotica #34 that they allegedly claimed joint ownership of.

name: shoinan
text: Phillipe is always our friend! Phillipe matters!

name: darthemed
text: Panel 11 makes me want to see Onstad do something like Watership Down.

name: luckypyjamas
text: "pasted"

name: cormanosanchez
text: Teodor's reaction reminded me of that scene in Jim Henson's Labyrinth, with the junk heap.

name: jandruff
text: That's what I was thinking too! Awesome.

name: meowmix
text: I gave this strip a 5 for Teodor's reaction after picking up that porn door. Hilarious.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

-Emeril-
NEW FORUM
First day on the new messageboard.

"Today Beef tried to get at my goat but that is his way and he is a joker always in new places that is how he makes himself express his anguish at the unknown."

name: splendorr
text: A prime cut. Thanks again for your work here, xiaomimi.

name: achilleselbow
text: This is not the only time that someone in Achewood has insulted the intelligence of a refrigerator.

name: charchar
text: Ruh-Roh

name: unsentletter
text:
I'm coming, [you]! I still love you! People care about you! You were always our friend! You matter!

Sometimes we all wish that such sentiment was directed at us. For someone to care so much.

name: lolsworth
text: YOU ARE RAD, FRIDGE! YOU...ARE...RAD!

name: pigeon_street
text:
I am now envious of an appliance as portrayed in a webcomic.
Thanks. Really.

name: pigeon_street
text: And I just realized that I forgot it was a couch we're talking about. A couch is not an appliance. For some reason I was thinking about the fridge.

name: lolsworth
text: I was going to make fun of you but then I noticed you're named Pigeon Street and that show ruled so I sympathise instead.

name: pogo
text: OH OH OH ... glad I'm reading this in the archives and don't have to wait to see what happens after the cooler-boat lid clicks shut, making it a coffin.

name: fuzzery
text: It must have turned 8:30.

name: jonmw
text: Only Justin knows for sure whether the pages were actually *pasted* to the door.

name: i_love_kate
text: If you take the ninth panel out of context, it sort of looks like Teodor is planning something evil.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: that is just too cute.

name: cancer
text: Anyone notice how Teodor says that that he and Justin had it when he was a kid?  As in Teodor was the kid while Justin was not.

name: stuntman
text: and then Justin made him touch his nintendo

name: stuntman
text: With no sustenance save for a stick of chapstick, Philipe cannot maintain vigilance.

name: dusty
text: The upcoming generation won't appreciate porn the way we did. I had a mostly destroyed catalog of porn videos that I found by the road and it was sacred to my cousin and I, all it had was little pictures of the covers of the videos and an add or two with some nudity in the back. Now that a kid can see 30 high rez vaginae any time they have a computer to themselves for 30 seconds, and for that matter video of any sex act imaginable. The pursuit of porn has become as unromantic as the porn itself.

name: pigeon_street
text: All I want out of life is to meet a toothless huffer-slut and make her my bride.

name: anzio
text: I don't know about Phillipe, but I was very aware that my couch was not something that could feel love when I was 5. Then again, I liked to break and burn things, so who knows.
